dcterms:creator: Xiaobai Li
Jie Chen
Guoying Zhao
Matti Pietikäinen
dcterms:description: MAHNOB-HCI is a public multi-modal database recorded by Soleymani et al. (2012) for affect recognition and implicit tagging. It includes data from two experiments: one is an emotion elicitation experiment and the other is an implicit tagging experiment.
dcterms:title: MAHNOB-HCI

dcterms:creator: Xiaobai Li
Jie Chen
Guoying Zhao
Matti Pietikäinen
dcterms:description: VideoHR is a simple database collected by the authors for evaluating the performance of the proposed method.
dcterms:title: VideoHR
